value: content=Designed by the famed master golf course architect Donald Ross, Crotched Mountain Golf Club is truly a New England classic. The original Mt. Crotched Golf Club, established 1929, is now Crotched Mountain Golf Club and while once existing as a 9 hole course, today is a par 71, 18 hole championship course. The new back nine, renovated as recently as 1992, and annually improved thereafter, has been constructed and maintained to preserve Ross' original design principles.

content=Located at Crotched Mountain Resort, Malarkey's Restaurant & Pub is a family style restaurant that offers live entertainment, billiards, karaoke, music and TV viewing. They're open for breakfast, brunch, lunch and dinner. They serve American and Irish cuisine with steak, chicken and seafood entrees. Appetizers, eggs, french toast, soups, salads, sandwiches, burgers, side dishes and desserts are listed on the menu. There is a full bar featuring domestic and imported liquors, wines, beers and microbrews.

content=112 spacious one and two bedroom villas are like your home away from home. Fully equipped kitchens, fireplaces, washers and dryers, and jetted hot tubs offer just the right place to relax and unwind. The resort also features an outdoor swimming pool, two Har-Tru clay tennis courts, and casual dining at Malarkeyâ€™s Restaurant & Pub.
